name: external_country_iso
description: ISO 3166 country codes worldwide with some additional information

name: external_party_castles_mair
description: party position data from Castles/Mair (1983)

name: external_party_benoit_laver
description: party data (party names) from Benoit/Laver (2006)

name: cabinet_party
description: list of parties that are members of a cabinet -- no party affiliation observations (party_id) are included if the prime minister is not a party member

name: viewcalc_party_position
description: policy positions of political parties in important dimensions as provided through various expert surveys

name: election_result
description: results of parliamentary elections at the party level

name: external_party_chess
description: party names from the codebook of Chapel Hill Expert Surveys Series (CHESS) on the positioning of political parties (1996, 1999, 2002, 2006, 2010)

name: cabinet
description: information about cabinets
comment: see documentation of table 'view_cabinet' for information about cabinet definition

name: info_variable
description: description of variables in ParlGov database tables

name: country
description: country data with links to other data sets

name: external_commissioner_doering
description: members of the European Union's College of Commissioners

name: party_change
description: linking parties that evolved through changes -- observation in this table link predecessor/successor parties or party splits  from 'party' table -- this information is still incomplete with updates and extensions in future ParlGov versions

name: viewcalc_election_parameter
description: calculated parameters about parliamentary elections -- see list of variables for further details
comment: Parameters are calculated by an R script at irregular intervals. Results for parties from party family 'none' (esp. 'no party affiliation' and 'others' parties) are removed from calculation (see Taagepera 1997; Gallagher/Mitchel 2005, 598-606).

name: external_party_huber_inglehart
description: party position data from Huber/Inglehart (1995)

name: party
description: party information with links to data sets (ParlGov external) that contain political positons of parties

name: party_name_change
description: information on official party names in case a party was renamed or if the official name is only used in shortened form

name: info_table
description: description of ParlGov database tables

name: election
description: information about a parliamentary election
comment: see documentation of  'view_election' for information about included parties

name: external_party_cmp
description: list of parties from the Comparative Manifestos Project (CMP) data set

name: info_data_source
description: list of references for ParlGov coding

name: external_party_euprofiler
description: list of parties from the EU Profiler (Trechsel/Mair 2009)

name: info_id
description: definitions for all id variables without a separate table
comment: Most id variables have only a limited number of entries and are included into this table.

name: view_party
description: Party information and merge table for various external data sets on party positions. (main view)
comment: Imputation of missing party positions by mean values for party family.

name: view_election
description: Election results for national and European Parliament elections. (main view)
comment: Includes vote share and number of seats of all parties that won seats in a democratic post-war election. For some countries, all parties that won more than one percent of the votes and the respective number of votes are included.

name: view_cabinet
description: Cabinet and opposition parties in parliament with their seat strength at each instance of government formation. (main view)
comment: new cabinets are defined for (I) any change in the set of parties holding cabinet membership; (II) any change in the identity of the prime minister; (III) any general election; (IV) any substantively meaningful resignation

name: external_party_ees
description: list of parties from the European Election Study (2009)

name: external_party_ray
description: list of parties from Ray (1999)

name: party_family
description: additional party families for a party
comment: The major party family category is coded in the 'party' table. This table includes additional categories such as regional parties, types of special issue parties, anti-system parties etc.

name: viewcalc_parliament_composition
description: compositon of parliament for changes in parliament (table 'parliament_change'), information about composition of parliament (table 'parliament_composition') and dates of cabinet formation ('start_date' from table 'cabinet')

name: viewcalc_country_year_share
description: country year weights for elections (national and EP) and cabinets -- each entry gives the share of the respective year the legislature or cabinet was in office

name: politician_president
description: Party-affiliated heads of state. Short-term acting presidents are not included.

name: view_variable
description: documentation of variables in main data tables (party, election, cabinet)
